column4: I want to edit the "sources.list". How do I get the rights to do that? I am the sysadmin...
sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list    (use sudo to get superuser privs)
It says in root in terminal: Warning: Cannot open display. When I tried in my account nothing happened at all.
you tried "sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list" in a normal terminal? (it won't work in root terminal)
